name: Wooden Bookcase
description: An industrial style bookcase with rustic charm.
detailOne: Bring rustic charm to your living space with this industrial style bookcase. Its open shelves and metal frame showcase a blend of modern and vintage aesthetics, making it a versatile piece for storing books, decor, and personal items.

name: Coffee Table
description: A classic wooden coffee table for a timeless look.
detailOne: Enhance your living room with this classic wooden coffee table. Crafted from solid wood, it features a timeless design that blends seamlessly with traditional and transitional decor styles. The sturdy construction ensures durability and longevity, making it a lasting addition to your home.

name: italian Sofa
description: A luxurious leather sectional sofa for spacious seating.
detailOne: Transform your living room with this luxurious leather sectional sofa. Its L-shaped design offers ample seating space, perfect for hosting guests or lounging with family. The premium leather upholstery adds sophistication to your decor while providing exceptional comfort.

name: White Armchair
description: A mid-century modern armchair with retro charm.
detailOne: Add a touch of retro charm to your living space with this mid-century modern armchair. Its sleek silhouette and tapered legs capture the essence of mid-century design, making it a stylish addition to any room. The upholstered seat and backrest offer comfort and support for relaxation.
